scripts.docker:build: yarn run run-script-if --bool "$(build-env global.build.docker)" --then "docker build -t $(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.registry)/$(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.account)/$(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.name):$(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.tag) ."
scripts.build:dev: yarn cleanup && yarn install:mvnw && yarn copy:assets
scripts.build:prod:darwin:linux: yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "yarn docker:build" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image build."
scripts.build:prod: yarn cleanup && yarn install:mvnw && yarn copy:assets && run-script-os
